docs.title: Compare whole genome assembly alignments using NCBI’s Comparative Genome Viewer (CGV)
docs.text:
This session is part of Biodiversity Genomics Academy 2023

Thu 14 Sep, 18:00 UTC Join on Zoom

docs.title: Session Leader(s)
docs.text: Sanjida Rangwala, PhD National Center for Biotechnology Information (NCBI), National Library of Medicine, US National Institutes of Health

docs.title: Description
docs.text: You will be introduced to NCBI's Comparative Sequence Viewer CGV, a web application that visualizes whole genome eukaryotic assembly-assembly alignments provided by NCBI. You will learn how to best take advantage of the CGV display, including tips on using zoom and filtering options to uncover biologically significant differences between two related genomes. We are in active development, so please contact us at NCBI with your requests for this tool.

docs.text:
1. Undergraduate level knowledge of molecular biology and genetics
